name: Chesapeake Solar
overview: Chesapeake Solar LLC provides solar energy solutions in North America. It engages in installing solar electricity and solar hot water systems for homes and businesses. The company also provides residential services, such as solar electric and solar hot water panels; and financial incentives services. In addition, it offers commercial services, such as grid-tie solar photovoltaic solutions; solar thermal systems; financing options for commercial or industrial solar energy applications; Web-based system monitoring of solar electric and solar water heating systems; and solar energy evaluation. Chesapeake Solar LLC was formerly known as Chesapeake Wind & Solar LLC. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Jessup, Maryland with operations in Maryland, the District of Columbia, Delaware, Southern Pennsylvania, Northern Virginia, Vermont, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, Connecticut, New York, and Oregon. As of July 8, 2008, Chesapeake Solar LLC operates as a subsidiary of groSolar.
